mapper.sql: b.id as b_id, b.bank_code as b_bank_code, b.bank_name as b_bank_name, b.bank_icon as b_bank_icon, b.bank_icon_grey as b_bank_icon_grey, b.bank_icon_back as b_bank_icon_back, b.is_enable as b_is_enable, b.sk_remark as b_sk_remark, b.kk_remark as b_kk_remark, b.add_time as b_add_time, b.modify_time as b_modify_time, b.add_operator_id as b_add_operator_id, b.modify_operator_id as b_modify_operator_id, b.is_delete as b_is_delete
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from cf_bank b
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into cf_bank (bank_code, bank_name, bank_icon, bank_icon_grey, bank_icon_back, is_enable, sk_remark, kk_remark, add_time, modify_time, add_operator_id, modify_operator_id, is_delete) values (#{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankIconGrey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankIconBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEnable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{skRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kkRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addOperatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyOperatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})

bank_code = #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_icon = #{bankIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
